messages: 5b67d980ae4c3c82251106e26913ce67 (16:58): Anybody; is the filter usable like this; http:/ 5b67d980ae4c3c82251106e26913ce67oetmer.nl/irc-logs/whatwg/20070321 ?
cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (17:06): it isn't possible to use <dialog> for a log like that, as currently defined
cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (17:07): you can't have timestamps and you can't have things like [14:01] * Joins: ff64b22fba69b8e8c087e9af5279900c (n=charlvn@196.21.192.15)
cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (17:08): how would you mark up those?
cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (17:09): the join/quit can just be stripped
ff64b22fba69b8e8c087e9af5279900c (17:41): 5b67d980ae4c3c82251106e26913ce67: the only people who have perfect code are utterly bored
cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (17:44): Lachy: s60webkit is not an exception to the rule that mobile browsers is tagsoup all the way (reading #html-wg logs)
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (17:56): hm, using <li> inside dialog isn't a bad idea
14af4ca97e316b17ea96286dc6882fd4 (17:57): so I guess the HTML WG will start with http://esw.w3.org/topic/RequirementsDocument
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (17:57): 14af4ca97e316b17ea96286dc6882fd4, no, you can say how you want it to start
14af4ca97e316b17ea96286dc6882fd4 (17:57): well first I would have to join it
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (17:57): afaik DanC is just putting down some thoughts
14af4ca97e316b17ea96286dc6882fd4 (17:57): actually, I guess it doesn't matter
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (17:58): public-html does accept e-mails from people not in the group
14af4ca97e316b17ea96286dc6882fd4 (17:58): if it comes down to it, Mozilla gets one vote
14af4ca97e316b17ea96286dc6882fd4 (17:58): but I don't expect there will ever be a vote
14af4ca97e316b17ea96286dc6882fd4 (17:59): is there any other reason to join?
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (17:59): at the moment it's just to state your opinion, pretty much...
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (17:59): I suspect that one MS joins there might be some more activity
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (17:59): such as how it's going to work...

cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (18:00): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: i guess since <p> is allowed where block-level elements are allowed, having <dialog><p> would imply that <dialog> can take any block-level elements. <li> is only allowed in specific places, so authors wouldn't get the idea that anything is allowed in <dialog>
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (18:00): 14af4ca97e316b17ea96286dc6882fd4, you always love a good flamebait ;)
14af4ca97e316b17ea96286dc6882fd4 (18:01): just make sure none of your proposals harm the ecology of the Document object ;)
bc75c2548b71aed454f81ac6897bd078 (18:24): I don't know how in the world 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e has time to respond to so many emails and edit the spec
3e1c1074b5072fb0e507ed33291ed9b1 (18:28): wonders if dialog can be used also for monolog like Hamlet's 8-)
